other_title: Gli Allegri Pirati Dell'Isola Del Tesoro (Italian)
Les Joyeux Pirates de l'île au Trésor (French)
plot: Jim is working as an innkeeper, together with his friend, the mouse Gran. One day, a mysterious man visits the inn, leaving a map behind. The map shows an island with a treasure. So the duo sets off in their own little boat, trying to fulfil their dreams and leaving the inn far behind. But it seems more people knows of the map, as they cross paths with Captain Silver and his band of wild pirates. Jim, Gran and their new friend Kathy tries to beat them in the treasure hunt that ensues.
opening_theme: "Chicchai Fune Datte" (ちっちゃい船だって) by Young Fresh, Mail Harmony
insert_song: "Kaizoku no Uta" (海賊のうた) by Mail Harmony
"Yume o Hirogeyou" (夢をひろげよう) by Fusako Amachi, Minori Matsushima
